metadata.title: CVE-2012-0826 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the Aggregator module inDrupal 6.x before 6.23 and 7.x before 7.11 allows remote attackers tohijack the authentication of unspecified victims for requests that updatefeeds and possibly cause a denial of service (loss of updates due to ratelimit) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0826` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
